desc: Cibaria International sources the highest quality products from around the world to provide wholesales olive oils, specialty oils, lifestyle oils, vinegars, butters and other edible & personal care oils to gourmet specialty shops, food service providers, industrial kitchens and food manufacturers around the country.

layout.text: Fabulous Flavors from All Around the World
Known throughout the food service industry for top-quality oils, vinegars, and shelf-stable items.
